alert.note: Alert for Cass; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 8:58PM EST until January 23 at 1:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST /NOON CST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Total ice accumulations of one tenth to one quarter of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and southwest Michigan. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST /noon CST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are expected tonight into Tuesday morning. The hazardous conditions will impact the Tuesday morning commute. Isolated power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Ice accumulations in excess of a quarter of an inch are possible, especially along and northwest of a line from roughly Monticello to Warsaw to Hillsdale. A gradual warming trend is expected Tuesday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages.
